text: Nghlhav Mehtabs Singh (11 November 1948 â€“ 5 January 2021) was an Indian boxer. He competed in the men's light heavyweight event at the 1972 Summer Olympics. Singh died on 5 January 2021, aged 72. ==References== Category:1948 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Olympians for India Category:Indian boxers
